## Pack.get() method

Get a pack by id

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get(packId: string): Promise<PackMetadata>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  packId | string | the id of the pack to fetch |

<b>Returns:</b>
